Model

Class Brick

  • java.lang.Object
    • Model.GameObject
      • Model.StillObject
        • Model.Brick
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Brick
extends StillObject
    Class for object to shoot at with the ball. When health == 0, it gets destroyed and may release the upgrade.
    Author:
    Antek
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • gotHit

        public boolean gotHit(GameObject go)
        Description copied from class: StillObject
        Function called when stillOject was hit by something. Should be overwritten when inheriting object actually do something when it is hit or it is removable object. Depending on object, which hit it, reactions may vary.Should return true, when life of stillObject is reduced to zero and stillObject should be destroyed.
        Overrides:
        gotHit in class StillObject
        Parameters:
        go - - object which hit stillObject
        Returns:
        by default always false. Should be overwritten by inheriting object so it returns true if object dies.

      • draw

        Description copied from class: GameObject
        Provide information how that Gameobject should be drawn.
        Specified by:
        draw in class GameObject
